contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1899 D Mountain Ash Contest (Second Section)
Mountain Ash Contest (Second Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
mountain-ash-contest-second-section
None
Gwalia
Football Ground, Mountain Ash 1st prize £12. 2nd prize £7. 3rd prize £2 and 4th prize £1 divided between Vochriw and Ystrad Volunteers. March contest held in conjuction with 1st Section 1st (£6) Mountain Ash, 2nd (£3) Aberdare Town, 3rd Arael Griffin. 6 bands competed
April 13, 2012, 4:33 p.m. Jan. 30, 2020, 11:35 p.m.
1 Tonyrefail Silver Prize Band Samuel Schofield
2 Mountain Ash Volunteers William Shaw
3 Ystrad Volunteers John Blamey
3 Fochriw Robert Dawson
5 Plymouth Workmens Thomas Hanney
6 Cwmbran Band Unknown
